page.title: 09NW.SHERBORNE:BUILDINGS (1)
page.content: Most of the buildings outside the Sherborne area are old and are built of{local stone,}many of them are{ { thatched. These buildings are either farm buildings or isolated dwellings. There are a few newer properties near the golf-course. The area within Sherborne contains a{council-house}estate of five roads. The houses here are built of{brick } with either{slate}or{tiled}roofs. A number of these houses have recently been bought by their tenants. The remaining residential streets in the area have a mixture of old stone buildings and a larger number of brick buildings between fifty and a hundred years old. There are two small estates of{new houses.} Along the A.30 there is a row of 6 small shops and a new fire-station.
